Name: Medical checkup
Description: care and treatment provided by a licensed medical provider directed at preventing, diagnosing, treating, or correcting a medical problem.

Name: Neurology
Description: Neurologists in the Health Lab provide comprehensive consultation, evaluation and treatment for a variety of neurological disorders.

Name: Dental Services and Treatment
Description: Private Dentists, who see their own patients and also many of whom provide services for people with medical cards.

Name: Mental Health Services
Description: Mental health problems can range from a low or sad period to a more serious depression, with a small number of people going on to experience severe mental health problems.

Name: Injury Units
Description: Injury Units are for the treatment of minor injuries that are unlikely to need admission to hospital.

Name: National Cancer Control Programme
Description: The National Cancer Control Programme works with health service providers to prevent cancer, treat cancer, and increase survival and quality of life for those who develop cancer
